turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I need to get pizza from Pisano's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Whatcha want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like two large pizzas with mushrooms and tuna

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay let me give them a call

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hopefully they have the fish

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They are out of fish right now

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh no, I'll change my order

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What topping would you like instead?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I guess I'll go with the mushrooms and banana peppers for each of the pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay let me try that. What sizes?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make one medium

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the other?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hmmm, make it large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, do you want any sides?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the pizzas

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I think this should work. For pick up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I will get it

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, the order is processed, it will be ready in 30 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much for your help

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be in your inbox on your mobile device
